<root><template><title>Command</title><part><name>Comments</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma </value></part><part><name>Game name</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00</value></part><part><name>Game version</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Positions </value></part><part><name>GROUP1</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns what surface type is at the given position. For surface texture see [[surfaceTexture]] command.<br>
<br>
<template lineStart="1"><title>Informative </title><part><name index="1"/><value> The command returns surface type of the ground, even underneath objects such as buildings and roads</value></part></template>
<ext><name>spoiler</name><attr> text="Show surface types (ArmA)"</attr><inner>
* #GRASSSOUTH
* #GRASSGENERAL
* #SANDGENERAL
</inner><close></spoiler></close></ext>
<ext><name>spoiler</name><attr> text="Show surface types (Arma 2)"</attr><inner>
* #UTGRASS - for natural surfaces
* #UTCONCRETE - for urban surfaces
</inner><close></spoiler></close></ext>

____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> [[surfaceType]] position </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> position: [[Array]] - format [[Position2D]] or [[Position3D]] in which case Z will be ignored </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value>
